mapper.sql: t.*, typeDict.id as "typeDict.id", typeDict.name as "typeDict.name", typeDict.code as "typeDict.code", brandDict.id as "brandDict.id", brandDict.name as "brandDict.name", brandDict.code as "brandDict.code", seriesDict.id as "seriesDict.id", seriesDict.name as "seriesDict.name", seriesDict.code as "seriesDict.code", supplierDict.id as "supplierDict.id", supplierDict.name as "supplierDict.name", supplierDict.code as "supplierDict.code"

LEFT JOIN tkl_product_type typeDict ON typeDict.id = t.dict_type_id LEFT JOIN tkl_dict_item brandDict ON brandDict.id = t.dict_brand_id LEFT JOIN tkl_dict_item seriesDict ON seriesDict.id = t.dict_series_id LEFT JOIN tkl_dict_item supplierDict ON supplierDict.id = t.dict_supplier_id
